tool_description: This API is used to determine the text from audio captcha data. The data can be provided as either a URL to the audio file, or a base64 encoded data stream. Both natural English alphabet and NATO alphabet are supported.
name: Audio Captcha
title: Audio Captcha

api_list.name: AudioCaptchaLambda
api_list.description: Use this API to decode the text from the audio data of an audio-based-captcha.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://audio-captcha.p.rapidapi.com/AudioCaptchaLambda"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "audio-captcha.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://audio-captcha.p.rapidapi.com/AudioCaptchaLambda"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "audio-captcha.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
